unnormalised: Arre yaar, Civil Law mhantlear kitli dokadukhi! Mhoje chacha-chem property-chem jhagdde dha vorsam thavn choltalem! Case district court-an 02/03/2014-ak file kelo, ani fattlim mahinyam matren solve zalo. Advocate Sharma-n taka fakt poili filing korcheakuch Rs. 50,000 ghetele. Asha kortam ani konnak he jhanjhat bhogunk podona mhunn.
normalised: Arre yaar, Civil Law mhantlear kitli dokdukhi! Mhojea chachak property vixoyant ten vorsam thawn jhagdde asle! Case district courtant dusrea March don hazar chodak file kelo, ani fattchea mhoineant to solve zalo. Advocate Sharman taka fokot file korchea khatir rupiya ponchas hazar ghetle. Aasha ashi konnakuch ti jhanjhat bhogonk poddonam.
